entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023
